docs.title: FS25 Interaction Design Methods
docs.text: Blog of Florian Kleiser, documenting the lessons and topics of the FS25 Interaction Design Methods class.

docs.title: Introduction to the Course
docs.text: The first lesson was an introduction to the course, going over the structure aswell as the assignment that we have to do in groups, where we are responsible for explaining one assigned topic from two different angles, and mediate a class lesson around the topic.
